#### PR description:

The **CLUE3D** pattern recognition algorithm has been fundamentally changed and improved.
A detailed description of the changes is contained both in the commit log and in these slides:

* [Link1](https://indico.cern.ch/event/1134760/)
* [Link2](https://indico.cern.ch/event/1127981/)
* [Link3](https://indico.cern.ch/event/1127982/)

#### PR validation:

Tested using workflows with `clue3d` process modifier enabled.
